Classic King Room

Our Classic King Room offers a perfect blend of comfort and style. At 300 sq. ft., it’s an ideal urban retreat.

Room Details

Relax and unwind in a space designed with modern travelers in mind. The room features a neutral color palette, luxurious linens, and a dedicated workspace. The marble bathroom includes a walk-in shower and premium toiletries.

Amenities

  • One King Bed
  • High-speed Wi-Fi
  • 55" Flat-screen TV
  • In-room safe
  • Work desk
The Central Park Hotel

Experience luxury and comfort in the heart of the city. The Central Park Hotel offers premium amenities, stunning views, and unparalleled service.
